channel.title: Salvatore Abello's Blog
channel.description: Personal blog about Cybersec & other things.

item.title: Intigriti Challenge 0325 - Leaky Flagment - Writeup
item.description:
<![CDATA[
This month, I decided to try to solve my first Intigriti challenge. There were many pieces to put together in order to solve this one, but in the end, I managed to succeed and learned a lot of stuff.]]>

item.title: CSS Exfiltration under default-src 'self'
item.description: <![CDATA[CSS Injections have always fascinated me. A few months ago, I asked myself: “is it possible to do CSS Exfiltration if default-src ‘self’ is specified in the CSP?” Well, if you’re reading this you already know the answer is yes. Also, I wrote a challenge about this for TRX CTF 2025: Keeper . This post will serve both as a writeup for the challenge and as an explanation of this new “technique”.]]>

item.title: fire-leak - ASIS CTF Finals 2024
item.description: <![CDATA[This year, I played in the ASIS CTF Finals with @TheRomanXpl0it, and we secured 7th place at the end of the CTF. I decided to write this up because I’ve never seen a similar challenge before. @simonedimaria and I worked on this challenge and solved it after about 8 hours. Overview As the name suggests, this is an XS-Leak challenge. We’re given the source code and there are three endpoints.]]>

item.title: resruby - CyberSpace CTF 2024
item.description:
<![CDATA[
I partecipated to the first edition ofCyberSpace CTF with@TheRomanXpl0it . It’s always nice to see some jail challenges so, I decided to write a writeup for the challenge I liked the most: resruby.]]>

item.title: Yet Another PyJail - PySysMagic - L3ak CTF 2024
item.description:
<![CDATA[
I partecipated to the first edition ofL3ak CTF withFoocHackz. I solved this challenge, it wasn’t hard but writing a working exploit took me at least one/two hours.]]>

item.title: One-shot CSS Injection - newdiary - 0ctf 2023
item.description:
<![CDATA[
This year, for the first time, I partecipated to0ctf withmhackeroni. Me,@Ricy and@Alemmi solved this challenge, we spent many hours in order to find a working exploit, but it was worth it.]]>

item.title: My First Writeup - ez-class - B01lers CTF 2023
item.description:
<![CDATA[
I liked this challenge a lot so I decided to create a writeup (my first, actually) about it. Thanks to the organizers for this wonderful CTF!]]>
